title: مكتبة في فلسطين
intro: Reading culture changes from place to place, and is affected by a number of factors like the education levels of the residents and the political climate of the area. Here we delve into the complexity of reading culture in the occupied Palestinian territories, and highlight one particular bookshop in Jerusalem, The Educational Bookshop, which provides a place to attend lectures, enjoy a coffee and find the latest books in both Arabic and English.
